thread.title: This Couple Did A "La La Land" Engagement Shoot And It's Pretty Cute
thread.title_full: This Couple Did A "La La Land" Engagement Shoot And It's Pretty Cute

author: Jenna Guillaume Editor-At-Large
title: This Couple Did A "La La Land" Engagement Shoot And It's Pretty Cute
text: Your Post Has Been Launched! Fabulous! Don't forget to share with your friends on Twitter and Facebook. TRENDING This Couple Did A “La La Land” Engagement Shoot And It’s Pretty Cute They stumbled on a view that’s tailor-made for two. Jenna Guillaume Editor-at-Large, BuzzFeed Australia 1. Ellen Wleklinski and Corey Collins are a Californian couple who recently celebrated their engagement with a La La Land -inspired photo shoot, and it’s pretty perfect. M. Hart Photography / Via mhartphoto.com ID: 10580723 2. Their photographer, Marlies Hartman , suggested the theme after falling in love with the movie and observing the similarities between Ellen and Corey, and Mia and Sebastian, the couple in the movie played by Emma Stone and Ryan Gosling. M. Hart Photography ID: 10580736 3. “Ellen and Corey are both native Californians who met and fell in love right here in LA, even though they grew up in neighbouring towns upstate,” Hartman told BuzzFeed. M. Hart Photography ID: 10580738 4. “They visited the Griffith Observatory for one of their first dates… They were both huge fans of the film, and Ellen always felt that Corey looked like her own personal Ryan Gosling!” M. Hart Photography ID: 10580753 5. Hartman said they didn’t want to recreate every shot from the movie, but rather showcase the “energy” of the love story. M. Hart Photography ID: 10580756 6. It was about “bringing to life a real-world Mia and Sebastian, and what their life would look like if they ended up together at the end of the film.”
